front.title: RTP Payload Format for SVC Video

abstract.t: This memo describes an RTP payload format for the scalable extension of the ITU-T Recommendation H.264 video codec which is technically identical to ISO/IEC International Standard 14496-10. The RTP payload format allows for packetization of one or more Network Abstraction Layer (NAL) units, produced by the video encoder, in each RTP payload. The payload format has wide applicability, such as low bit-rate conversational, Internet video streaming, or high bit-rate entertainment quality video.
